name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are known for their skill in warfare, their ability to withstand physical and magical punishment, their knowledge of the earth's secrets, their hard work, and their love of fine craftsmanship.

effects.name: Poison Resistance
effects.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison.

effects.name: Magic Resistance
effects.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects.

effects.name: Giant Hunter
effects.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against orcs and goblinoids.

effects.name: Giant Dodger
effects.description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant type.

effects.name: Stone Appraiser
effects.description: +2 racial bonus on Appraise checks for stone/metal items.

effects.name: Stone Crafter
effects.description: +2 racial bonus on Craft checks for stone/metal items.

effects.name: Keen Eyed
effects.description: +2 racial bonus on Search checks to notice unusual stonework.

effects.name: Stable
effects.description: +4 bonus on checks to resist being bull rushed or tripped.

effects.name: Stonecunning
effects.description: Can make a Search check for unusual stonework when passing within 10 feet. Can use Search to find stonework traps. Can intuit depth underground.

effects.name: Weapon Familiarity
effects.description: Treat dwarven waraxes and dwarven urgrothes as martial weapons instead of exotic.
